caption.p: Modulation of NF-κB activation by medicinal plant decoctions (24 h). Data shown are means ± SD of three independent experiments. *** p < 0.005 as compared to cells untreated with lipopolysaccharides (LPS) (0 in white); # p < 0.05, ## p < 0.01 and ### p < 0.005 compared to cells treated with LPS (black bar).
